mapper.select: SELECT MC.CLUB_NO , MC.MEMBER_NO , CASE WHEN C.CREATOR_NO = MC.MEMBER_NO THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END AS CREATOR_YN , MC.ADMIN_YN , C.DEL_YN FROM MEMBER_CLUB MC LEFT OUTER JOIN CLUB C ON MC.CLUB_NO = C.NO WHERE C.NO = #{clubNo} AND MC.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT M.NO ,MC.ADMIN_YN ,NVL( (SELECT ADMIN_YN FROM MEMBER_CLUB MC_SUB JOIN CLUB C_SUB ON MC_SUB.CLUB_NO = C_SUB.NO JOIN MEMBER M_SUB ON MC_SUB.MEMBER_NO = M_SUB.NO WHERE MC_SUB.MEMBER_NO = C_SUB.CREATOR_NO AND MC_SUB.CLUB_NO = #{clubNo} AND M_SUB.NO = #{memberNo}) ,'N' ) AS CLUB_MASTER FROM MEMBER_CLUB MC JOIN CLUB C ON MC.CLUB_NO = C.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON MC.MEMBER_NO = M.NO WHERE M.NO = #{memberNo} AND C.NO = #{clubNo}

SELECT C.NO , C.NAME , C.CATEGORY_NO , C.CREATOR_NO , C.CLUB_DESCRIPTION , C.AGE_LIMIT , C.SIGNUP_LIMIT , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.DEL_YN , CC.CATEGORY_NAME , I.FILE_URL , M.NICK , (SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) FROM MEMBER_CLUB WHERE CLUB_NO = C.NO) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM CLUB C JOIN MEMBER M ON C.CREATOR_NO = M.NO JOIN CLUB_CATEGORY CC ON C.CATEGORY_NO = CC.CATEGORY_NO JOIN CLUB_IMAGE_FILE I ON C.NO = I.NO
WHERE CC.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE '%'||#{searchString}||'%'
WHERE C.${searchMenu} LIKE '%'||#{searchString}||'%'
AND DEL_YN = 'N'

SELECT C.NO ,C.NAME ,M.NICK ,C.SIGNUP_LIMIT ,C.AGE_LIMIT ,TO_CHAR(C.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE ,CC.CATEGORY_NAME ,C.CLUB_DESCRIPTION ,CI.FILE_URL , (SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) FROM MEMBER_CLUB WHERE CLUB_NO = C.NO) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM CLUB C JOIN CLUB_IMAGE_FILE CI ON C.NO = CI.NO JOIN MEMBER M ON C.CREATOR_NO = M.NO JOIN CLUB_CATEGORY CC ON C.CATEGORY_NO = CC.CATEGORY_NO WHERE C.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CLUB(NO, CATEGORY_NO, CREATOR_NO, NAME, CLUB_DESCRIPTION, AGE_LIMIT, SIGNUP_LIMIT) VALUES (SEQ_CLUB_NO.NEXTVAL, #{categoryNo}, #{creatorNo}, #{name}, #{clubDescription}, #{ageLimit}, #{signupLimit})
INSERT INTO MEMBER_CLUB(MEMBER_NO, CLUB_NO, ADMIN_YN) VALUES(#{creatorNo}, SEQ_CLUB_NO.CURRVAL,'Y')
INSERT INTO CLUB_IMAGE_FILE(NO, FILE_URL, FILE_NAME) VALUES (SEQ_CLUB_NO.CURRVAL, #{fileUrl}, #{fileName})
mapper.select: SELECT C.NO , C.NAME , C.CATEGORY_NO , C.CREATOR_NO , C.CLUB_DESCRIPTION , C.AGE_LIMIT , C.SIGNUP_LIMIT , C.ENROLL_DATE , C.DEL_YN , CC.CATEGORY_NAME , M.NICK , CIF.FILE_URL , (SELECT COUNT(MEMBER_NO) FROM MEMBER_CLUB WHERE CLUB_NO = #{no}) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM CLUB C JOIN CLUB_CATEGORY CC ON C.CATEGORY_NO = CC.CATEGORY_NO JOIN MEMBER M ON C.CREATOR_NO = M.NO JOIN CLUB_IMAGE_FILE CIF ON C.NO = CIF.NO WHERE C.NO = #{no}

SELECT CASE WHEN TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(RESI_NUM, 8, 1)) IN (3, 4) THEN TRUNC((SYSDATE - TO_DATE('20' || SUBSTR(RESI_NUM, 1, 6), 'YYYYMMDD')) / 365) ELSE TRUNC((SYSDATE - TO_DATE('19' || SUBSTR(RESI_NUM, 1, 6), 'YYYYMMDD')) / 365) END AS AGE, C.AGE_LIMIT, MC.MEMBER_COUNT, C.SIGNUP_LIMIT AS MEMBER_LIMIT FROM MEMBER M JOIN CLUB C ON C.NO = #{clubNo} LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CLUB_NO, COUNT(MEMBER_NO) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM MEMBER_CLUB GROUP BY CLUB_NO ) MC ON MC.CLUB_NO = C.NO WHERE M.NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT MC.MEMBER_NO ,MC.CLUB_NO ,MC.ADMIN_YN ,TO_CHAR(MC.REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE ,M.NICK ,M.NAME ,M.PHONE ,M.EMAIL ,CASE WHEN C.CREATOR_NO = MC.MEMBER_NO THEN C.CREATOR_NO END AS CREATOR_NO FROM MEMBER_CLUB MC JOIN MEMBER M ON MC.MEMBER_NO = M.NO JOIN CLUB C ON MC.CLUB_NO = C.NO WHERE MC.CLUB_NO = #{clubNo} ORDER BY CASE WHEN C.CREATOR_NO = MC.MEMBER_NO THEN 0 ELSE 1 END, ADMIN_YN DESC, REG_DATE
